about_the_game:
The Digital Extras of SpellForce 3: Fallen God contain a PDF artbook.

The artbook features a collection of beautiful art created by the Grimlore Games art team for SpellForce 3: Fallen God. Featuring renders, concept art and a lot more art but also including some lore related context.

Get a behind the scenes look on how your favorite art was transformed into something magical.
